amendment.description: Amendment provides for designating the visitor center at the Channel Islands National Park in California as the "Robert J. Lagomarsino Visitor Center".
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of the bill as reported by the Committee on Resources.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Resources.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Resources amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
